title: AHS 1984 Finale Featured Every Season of AHS
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I would say that the shot where Bobby richter was looking back at his family was similar too when ben and Vivien and violet were looking at the family they had just scared out of the murder house in the finale!
I love these comparisons. Automatically subbing .I'm so excited for season 10

The apocalypse connection is how the Nightstalker continually resurrects just like Michael had in the finale. Gets me thinking about how many anti-christs there are and what exactly it means. Part of me thinks that Michael is the intended vessel because he had magical blood being related to Constance. All the Nightstalker has is a bad attitude.
I only picked up on the Roanoke reference because it was so obvious. This is everything I can’t wait for more 🖤 been loving you and your vids forever xx
These are great. However I missed a couple of seasons, but these subtle nods to seasons past are pretty good. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
